text: @RandPaul @NYGovCuomo New York has flatten the curve, and unlike Trump Cuomo didn’t lie his ass off at his coronavirus briefings. Rand Paul voted against coronavirus emergency aid bill and voted against free coronavirus testing in March. Rand doesn’t have a leg to stand on.
